theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53 Pathway-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p53 protein variations and their dual role in modulating cellular senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53 Pathway-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes p53 network regulating DNA damage responses, balancing tumor suppression and aging via senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53 Pathway-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes BTK regulation of p53-induced senescence and its impact on senescent cell accumulation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Caveolin-1 Mediated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights caveolin-1 as a mediator of oxidative stress-induced premature senescence via multiple signaling pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Caveolin-1 Mediated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caveolin-1 involvement in replicative and stress-induced premature senescence driven by oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Caveolin-1 Mediated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress, ROS, and inflammation driving senescence and SASP, with impaired autophagy contributing.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Caveolin-1 Mediated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere erosion and oxidative stress as key drivers of replicative senescence and cellular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on NF-kB signaling dysregulation linking oxidative stress, inflammation, and immune homeostasis to senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes cGAS/STING pathway activation by cytosolic DNA leading to NF-kB-mediated inflamm-aging and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links cellular senescence, SASP, immunosenescence, and inflammation in multimorbidity via inflammatory pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights accelerated senescence, immunosenescence, and inflammation driving cardiovascular disease in CKD.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on redox-senescence axis, SASP, and dual roles of senescence in cancer and age-related inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence-associated fibrosis driven by SASP, redox imbalance, and chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers senescence and SASP roles in lung aging and disease, emphasizing inflammatory microenvironment effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB and Inflammatory Signaling-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: COPD as accelerated aging disease driven by oxidative stress, DNA damage, inflammation, and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on replicative senescence via telomere shortening and stress-induced senescence in cardiovascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening as primary cause of replicative senescence and its role in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes irreversible cell cycle arrest from telomere shortening and DNA damage with SASP effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on endogenous nuclear DNA damage accumulation driving senescence independent of telomere attrition.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence and apoptosis regulation affecting tissue homeostasis and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers senescence induced by telomere shortening, DNA damage, oxidative stress, and mitochondrial dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes irreversible growth arrest and accumulation of senescent cardiac cells impairing tissue renewal.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere attrition, mitochondrial dysfunction, and key signaling pathways driving cardiovascular senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune System Senescence and Host Susceptibility Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on replicative senescence of lymphocytes, immune defects, and stem cell regeneration affecting immune aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune System Senescence and Host Susceptibility Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links senescence-driven immune decline to host susceptibility and epidemiological patterns of infectious diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune System Senescence and Host Susceptibility Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses accumulation of senescent cells impairing tissue regeneration and promoting chronic inflammation.
